entry.title: WIND WARNING , Canmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border late this evening and overnight. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 late this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
